    • getStudents

    • addStudents

      public static void addStudents(CollegeManager collegeManager, int oneStudent)
      The method adds new students with specific amount. If the array is not empty it will start from the last index.
      Parameters:
      collegeManager - students list.
      oneStudent - Check if to add one student or more (1. One Student, 0. Multiply Students)

    • printStudents

      public static void printStudents(CollegeManager collegeManager)
      The method prints all the students and its index.
      Parameters:
      collegeManager - students list.

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      Driver Method that shows the menu and gives options. For example show student list, add a new student, add a bunch of students or delete a specific student.
